Sentencas: In3+ was used as dopant for BaZrO3 proton conductor and 30 at%-doped BaZrO3 samples (BaZr0.7In0.3O3-delta.
Titulo: Sinteractivity, proton conductivity and chemical stability of BaZr0.7In0.3O3-δ for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: BZI) were prepared as electrolyte materials for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Sinteractivity, proton conductivity and chemical stability of BaZr0.7In0.3O3-δ for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The BZI material showed a much improved sinteractivity compared with the conventional Y-doped BaZrO3.
Titulo: Sinteractivity, proton conductivity and chemical stability of BaZr0.7In0.3O3-δ for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The BZI pellets reached almost full density after sintering at 1600 degrees C for 10 h, whereas the Y-doped BaZrO3 samples still remained porous under the same sintering conditions.
Titulo: Sinteractivity, proton conductivity and chemical stability of BaZr0.7In0.3O3-δ for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The conductivity measurements indicated that BZI pellets showed smaller bulk but improved grain boundary proton conductivity, when compared with Y-doped BaZrO3 samples.
Titulo: Sinteractivity, proton conductivity and chemical stability of BaZr0.7In0.3O3-δ for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: A total proton conductivity of 1.7 x 10(-3) S cm(-1) was obtained for the BZI sample at 700 degrees C in wet 10% H-2 atmosphere.
Titulo: Sinteractivity, proton conductivity and chemical stability of BaZr0.7In0.3O3-δ for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The BZI electrolyte material also showed adequate chemical stability against CO2 and H2O, which is promising for application in fuel cells.
Titulo: Sinteractivity, proton conductivity and chemical stability of BaZr0.7In0.3O3-δ for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)
